title: On Films
text:
Here’s where I jot down my thoughts (mostly a stream of consciousness) about films that I watch daily. If you do end up reading them, hit me up! I’d love to talk about your thoughts.












All Reviews

title: Sinners (2025)
text:
Quite possibly one of the best films I have seen this year.

"Music is power…"
Time, memory, history and commentary mix in this Ryan Coogler classic, as it crescendoes into an epic culminating in one of the most memorable filmgoing experiences I’ve had.
